narrative.narrative: Coyne Airways is a cargo airline based at London Stansted. It also has bases at Cologne,Germany, Dubai,UAE and Tbilisi,Georgia. It was founded in 1994. They as of June 2013 besides their bases they fly to 3 airports in Afghanistan, 3 in Iraq,3 in Kazakhstan which are not the main cities of Almaty or Astana, 2 in Turkmenistan,and one each in Armenia and Azerbaijian. Also at this time they had a 747-400F,a Tupolev 204C,a Il-76 and an AN-12.
